description:
August 2-4: Lions Park to 7 Street/8 Street SW - CTrain service disruptions

The Red Line will be closed between Lions Park and 7 Street/8 Street stations starting Saturday, August 2, until the early hours of Tuesday, August 5.

Red Line trains coming from the south and downtown will terminate at 7 Street Station for northbound travel, and trains coming from the northwest will terminate at Lions Park Station. For travel between downtown and Lions Park Station, we¿ll have Red Line replacement shuttle buses

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
